participant_1.background:
I'm not sure I could be a professional dog walker if I were blind because I wouldn't be able to see where the dogs are going.
My medication makes me sleepy sometimes, so I once pretended to be asleep in my car in order to get out of a speeding ticket.
I prefer to listen to my own music on my own terms.
cooking is my passion.
My family is very supportive of my sleep schedule and my need for exercise.

participant_2.background:
I like to dye my hair bright colors, but I have to be careful because of my theater commitments.
I've never been arrested, but I would love to travel the world and play music like my brother.
i have broken my arm twice.
I never knew my father, but my mother is always there for me.
I am a hippopotamus, and I spend my days swimming in the river, eating plants, and basking in the sun.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
Hey there, I'm doing well! Thanks for asking.
I like to play music, swim, and spend time with my family.
That's awesome! I love to cook and play music too. What kind of music do you play?
I play the guitar and the piano. I love all kinds of music, but I especially like to play blues and jazz.
Wow, that's really cool! I've always wanted to learn how to play the guitar.
It's not that hard! You just have to practice a lot.
I guess I could try. Do you have any tips for beginners?
Sure! The best tip I can give is to just start playing. Don't worry about making mistakes, just have fun and experiment.
Thanks for the advice! I'll definitely try that.
You're welcome! I hope you have fun!
